SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetExpense
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
Direct Known Subclasses:
PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense, PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense
public class PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense extends BudgetExpense
Represents an expenditure within the Public Investment Budget (PIB) framework.

This class extends BudgetExpense and serves as the parent for specialized investment types such as National and Co-funded expenses. It provides mechanisms for global instance tracking and hierarchical data aggregation.

  • Field Details

    • publicInvestmentBudgetExpenses

      protected static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense> publicInvestmentBudgetExpenses

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense(String entityCode, String entityName, String serviceCode, String serviceName, String code, String description, String type, String category, long amount)
      Constructs a new Public Investment Budget (PIB) expense entry and automatically registers it in the global PIB collection. * @param entityCode The unique identifier for the ministry or government entity.
      Parameters:
      entityName - The human-readable name of the ministry.
      serviceCode - The specific identifier for the department or service.
      serviceName - The name of the service associated with the expense.
      code - The budget classification code.
      description - Textual description of the expenditure.
      type - The investment segment (e.g., "ΕΘΝΙΚΟ" or "ΣΥΓΧΡΗΜΑΤΟΔΟΤΟΥΜΕΝΟ").
      category - The broader classification category of the expense.
      amount - The monetary value of the entry in long format (representing subunits).

  • Method Details

    • getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetExpenses

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense> getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetExpenses()
      Retrieves the global registry of all PIB expenditure entries.

      This list provides a centralized point of access for all PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense instances created during the application session. * @return An ArrayList containing all recorded PIB expense objects.

    • getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentExpenseCategory

      public static Map<String,Long> getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentExpenseCategory()
      Aggregates expenditures across all PIB segments (National and Co-funded) by category.

      This method performs a sophisticated merge of two source maps. It utilizes a LinkedHashMap to maintain the order of categories. If a budget category exists in both the National and Co-funded segments, the amounts are merged using the Long.sum(long, long) function. * @return A consolidated Map where keys are category identifiers and values are the total aggregated sums.

    • calculateSum

      public static long calculateSum()
      Calculates the grand total of the entire Public Investment Budget.

      This is computed by aggregating the totals from the National and Co-funded sub-segments. The mathematical logic follows: $$TotalSum_{PIB} = Sum_{National} + Sum_{CoFunded}$$ * @return The total sum of all PIB expenditures.

    • getDescriptionWithCode

      public static String getDescriptionWithCode(String code)
      Looks up the description associated with a specific budget code within the PIB list.

      This method delegates the search logic to BudgetExpenseLogicService to ensure consistent lookup behavior across the system. * @param code The budget code to search for.

      Returns:
      The descriptive string assigned to the provided code.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Retrieves the specific investment segment type of the instance. * @return A String representing the segment type (e.g., National or Co-funded).

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the PIB expenditure entry.

      Extends the default BudgetExpense.toString() output by appending the specific investment segment ("Σκέλος") information. * @return A detailed string including core expense data and the investment type.

      Overrides:
      toString in class BudgetExpense
      Returns:
      A string containing all field values.
